name: CCMS
description:
CCMS: Cornèr Card Management System 

Application developed by Vestigo that includes core CMS (short for Card Management System) functionalities (COL - Collection Management, COM - Communication, CFG - Configuration Management, CCS - Customer Care Services, DIS - Disputes Management, FEE - Fee Management, FIN - Financials Management, GSF - General Supporting Functions, IPE - Issuer Personalization, AIM - Issuing Account Management, ICA - Issuing Contract Management, ILM - Issuing Limit Management, ISM - Issuing Status Management, LOY - Loyalty Management, NET - Network Management, PAM - Partner Management , PAY - Payments, PIF - Person Information File, TRX - Transaction Management, VAS - Value Added Services)
